{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.14969v1", "title": "Evaluating LLMs on Chinese Topic Constructions: A Research Proposal
  Inspired by Tian et al. (2024)", "summary": "This paper proposes a framework for evaluating large language models (LLMs)
on Chinese topic constructions, focusing on their sensitivity to island
constraints. Drawing inspiration from Tian et al. (2024), we outline an
experimental design for testing LLMs' grammatical knowledge of Mandarin syntax.
While no experiments have been conducted yet, this proposal aims to provide a
foundation for future studies and invites feedback on the methodology.", "main_category": "cs.CL", "categories": "cs.CL", "published": "2025-04-21T08:56:23Z"}
